actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 and the Interstate Commerce Act to authorize reduced fare transportation on a space-available basis for persons who are 65 years of age or older.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Federal Aviation Act and the Interstate Commerce Act, reduced common carrier transportation fare on airlines and railroads on a space-available basis for persons who are sixty-five years of age or older.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 and the Interstate Commerce Act to authorize reduced fare transportation on a space-available basis for persons who are 65 years of age or older.
